title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: New polling suggests Americans remain bullish on travel for 2026, but there are clouds on the horizon
items.description: Travel demand remains strong for 2026, according to a new survey from YouGov and TPG, with 72% planning to spend the same or more on travel in 2026.

items.title: Emirates and Marriott to debut first-ever Ritz-Carlton Lodge this year — and it's all-inclusive
items.description: Marriott International will open the first-ever Ritz-Carlton Lodge later this year in Australia’s stunning Blue Mountains, marking a milestone for the...

items.title: Earn 125,000 bonus points with the current offer on the Chase Sapphire Reserve
items.description: The Chase Sapphire Reserve is currently offering up to 175,000 Ultimate Rewards points — here's what to know if you're considering applying.

items.title: The best credit cards to reach elite status
items.description: Earning airline or hotel elite status is no easy feat. Fortunately, there are credit cards that help you reach elite status faster.

items.title: Delta orders 31 long-range Airbus jets with an eye on premium seats
items.description: Delta Air Lines will expand its fleet of Airbus widebodies with more A330neos and A350s.
